conv.text: Hello, what are you doing here?

answers.option: I'm here to hack your computer

conv.text: What?! Why would you want to do that? I'm just a kid!

answers.option: I want to steal your code for the Generative AI program

conv.text: Oh, okay. Well, have a nice day!
That's not cool! I worked really hard on that program. Please don't do it!

answers.option: No, I'm going to do it

conv.text: Thank you! I appreciate it. Be more careful in the future!
